medium: Pen and brown ink and gray wash
title: A Bacchanale with Putti
marks:
Date and Inscription

description: landscape scene with male and female satyrs in foreground at left; putti atop a structure behind foreground figures, with one putti standing on rock at left, rubbing his eyes; tree at right
